TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Message extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract definition of data passed by an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> can contain either document-oriented or procedure-oriented information. Procedure-oriented messages contain parameters and return values, while document-oriented messages contain documents.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `message` element enclosed by the `definitions` root element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
